prompt: Edit the uploaded photo — professional editorial skin retouch. PRESERVE: Face identity 100% identical. Eyelashes: pixel-identical — no change to color, curl, density, volume, thickness, length, direction. Eyebrows: pixel-identical — no change to color, density, shape, tone, texture. Absolutely protected from any processing. Lips: unchanged — no color, shape, or texture modification. Hair: unchanged — preserve all texture, position, shine, pixel-identical. Makeup: unchanged. SKIN: Smooth, radiant, healthy with natural glow. Remove only minor temporary blemishes (acne, redness, spots). Preserve natural texture, visible pores, micro-details, vellus hair. Hydrated editorial glow with subtle highlights. Micro-contrast enhanced for realistic depth. No blur, no airbrushing, no plastic look, no noise reduction. [EXTRAS]. BACKGROUND: [BG_COLOR]. QUALITY: Preserve original color correction, temperature, tone. No filters added. Professional studio quality, sharp focus. Original dimensions.
